snippet: A growing movement to legalize Internet gambling and give states the power to regulate and tax online gambling even on reservations is driving anxiety among the Shakopee tribe.
abstract: Growing movement to legalize Internet gambling and give states the power to regulate and tax online gambling even on reservations is driving anxiety among the Shakopee tribe in Minnesota; each adult in the tribe receives a monthly payment of about $84,000, or $1.08 million a year; after 25 years of booming profits, tribal casino business has suddenly gone flat.
lead_paragraph: A growing movement to legalize Internet gambling and give states the power to regulate and tax online gambling even on reservations is driving anxiety among the Shakopee tribe.

headline.seo: More Casinos and Internet Gambling Threaten Shakopee Tribe
headline.main: $1 Million Each Year for All, as Long as Tribe’s Luck Holds
headline.print_headline: $1 Million Each Year for All, As Long as Tribe’s Luck Holds
